SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Robert Eastwood’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I want the world to understand that education is hope.  When students learn to think, feel, reason, and question, the world becomes a better place…”

– Mr. Robert Eastwood, Kindergarten Educator @PropelSchools @mansfieldu @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/education-is-hope-think-feel-reason-question-better-world/
